title: where are the icons gone on the boards?
body: i just realised this but does anyone else get the question marks instead of your summoners icon?

replies.body: They are back now yes? I was also wondering why they were MIA.
The funny thing is one of the reasons behind using boards was so that would never happen.

Eh not really funny. Amusing yes.

But to be fair it has happened on the boards far less than it did on the forums.
Maybe so but boards have been around for a significantly shorter amount of time and Riot did promise it wouldn't happen on boards, which it now has.

I don't remember them saying that it wouldn't happen at all, just that it issues would arise less often.

And really this is the first time it's happened over what two or three months now?
It happened twice a week on the forums.

I also have to praise the boards for having fixed many other issues that the forums had, like how they forced you to clean out temp data on a bi weekly basis or else you couldn't use the forums.
another one of riots wonderful ideas being not up to standard...

> [{quoted}](name=RLG Shaky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PU6JRxWr,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-27T14:54:27.563+0000)
>
> i just realised this but does anyone else get the question marks instead of your summoners icon?

yeah I noticed it thought it was my computer not loading it properly but it's been 2 days now so I know its not my PC
